mapper.insert: INSERT INTO find_owner (goods_id, goods_smallkind, goods_postscrit, goods_pubtime, goods_contact, goods_contact_way, goods_photo, goods_bigkind) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{goodsSmallkind}, #{goodsPostscrit}, #{goodsPubtime}, #{goodsContact}, #{goodsContact_way}, #{goodsPhoto}, #{goodsBigkind})
